title: Render Health
description: Daily Tractor render job success rate, CPU consumption, and failed frames (gold_render_health_daily).

panels.title: Render Success Rate (%)
panels.description: Daily average render job success rate across all shows and sequences.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, ROUND(AVG(success_rate_pct), 2) AS "Success Rate %" FROM gold_render_health_daily GROUP BY event_date ORDER BY event_date

panels.title: Total CPU Hours
panels.description: Daily total CPU-hours consumed by all render jobs.  Use for capacity planning and cost tracking.

targets.rawSql: SELECT event_date::TIMESTAMP AS time, ROUND(SUM(total_cpu_hours), 4) AS "CPU Hours" FROM gold_render_health_daily GROUP BY event_date ORDER BY event_date
